title: Husband fatally shoots wife in the head
content:
HOUSTON- A young woman was fatally shot in the head by her husband on Saturday night in a Greater Eastwood home.
According to the Houston Police Department, they received a call about a woman being shot around 9:30 p.m. near the intersection of Pease Street and Ernestine Street.
Upon arrival at the scene, police found a woman in her mid-20's with a single gunshot wound. She was immediately transported to the hospital where she died.
Her husband told investigators that he "accidentally" shot her. Police took her husband downtown for questioning.
The investigation is ongoing, and they have not stated where or not it was an accident.
(© 2017 KHOU)
